quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.description: New to Lightsler AI Translator? Here's how to get started:
steps: 1. Go to the main dashboard and click 'Scan Resources' to discover translatable content
2. Select your target languages from the language selector
3. Click 'Batch Translate' to translate multiple items at once
4. Review translations in the resource detail view
5. Click 'Publish' or 'Batch Publish' to push translations to your Shopify store
6. Monitor your credit usage in the Billing page

items.question: How do translation credits work?
items.answer: Each plan includes monthly credits. 1 credit = ~1 word translated. Unused monthly credits expire at the end of each billing cycle. Top-up credits purchased separately never expire.

items.question: What content types can be translated?
items.answer: We support 26 resource types including products, collections, blogs, pages, themes, navigation menus, policies, metafields, product options, and more.

items.question: Can I review translations before publishing?
items.answer: Yes! All translations are stored in our database first. You can review, edit, and approve them before publishing to your store.

items.question: How does the glossary/brand protection work?
items.answer: Our AI automatically preserves brand names, HTML tags, and special formatting. You can also configure custom terms that should never be translated.

items.question: Is this compatible with Shopify Markets?
items.answer: Yes, Lightsler AI Translator is built specifically for Shopify Markets. It handles primary and secondary languages correctly.

items.question: What happens to my data if I uninstall?
items.answer: Upon uninstallation, your data is soft-deleted immediately and permanently purged within 48 hours, in compliance with GDPR.

items.issue: Translations not appearing in my store
items.solution: Ensure you've clicked 'Publish' after translation. Check that the target language is enabled in Shopify Settings > Store languages.
Our AI provides draft-quality translations. For critical content, we recommend human review. You can edit translations before publishing.
Upgrade your plan or purchase top-up credits from the Billing page. Top-up credits never expire.
Large batches may take time. Use the queue system for bulk operations. Check the Status page for progress updates.
